Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Requires third-party verification of an application to receive the Empire State film production credit and the Empire State film post production credit
Summary: Requires third-party verification of an application to receive the Empire State film production credit and the Empire State film post production credit by approved certified public accountants.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to requiring third-party verification of an application to receive the Empire State film production credit and the Empire State film post production credit
